MyNet.name: MyNet
MyNet.desc: Returns a link to Haaga-Helia MyNet login page.

Bistro.name: Bistro today
Bistro.desc: Returns todays Haaga-Helia Pasila campus bistro menu.

Lukkari.name: Lukkari
Lukkari.desc: Returns a link to Haaga-Helia lukkarikone.

Google Maps Picture.name: Google Map Picture
Google Maps Picture.desc: Returns a map of the specified location as a picture.

Google Places.name: Near Reastaurants
Google Places.desc: Returns up to 7  nearest restaurants to a specified location.

Google Travel Time.name: Travel Time
Google Travel Time.desc: Returns estimated travel time between two specified locations.

HSL.name: HSL
HSL.desc: Returns information about HSL public transport route between specified locations.

Helsinki City.name: Helsinki City events
Helsinki City.desc: Returns nearest Helsinki City events to a specified location.

Demo.name: Demo
Demo.desc: Displays different ways for bot to send and format messages

Haiku.name: Haiku
Haiku.desc: Sends random haiku to the channel
